GameController - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.controller
This server-side class controls the game flow of a game in Normal mode towards all of its phases, from its creation to the winner's declaration.
GameController() - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
Game controller constructor.
GameControllerExpertMode - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.controller
This server-side class is the GameController's subclass, and offers new (overridden) methods to handle the game flow of a game in Expert mode.
GameControllerExpertMode() - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameControllerExpertMode
Game controller constructor.
GameControllerFactory - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.controller
This class acts as a factory method for the game controller construction (it can be GameController or GameControllerExpertMode).

GameState - Enum Class in it.polimi.ingsw.controller
This enumeration contains the two possible states of a game (SETUP if the game controller is still accepting players, IN_GAME if the game has started).

Receives a message from a client and executes different actions according to the message's type and according to which state is the game in: adding players to the queue (state SETUP) or modifying parts of the model (state IN_GAME).
